metadata.title: Freight Claims Specialist Resume Template
metadata.description: A professional resume template tailored for Freight Claims Specialist positions, highlighting technical skills and project experience

template_tips: Include metrics and impact where possible
Highlight both technical and soft skills
Keep it to one page unless you have 10+ years of experience

resume_content.summary: Results-driven professional with 6 years of experience in handling lost, damaged, or delayed shipment claims. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and optimizing performance.

experience.title: Senior Freight Claims Specialist
achievements: Led a team to reduce claim processing time by 30% through improved workflows.
Successfully reclaimed over $1.5 million in unresolved freight claims in 2023.
Implemented an automated tracking system that increased claim resolution efficiency by 25%.

experience.title: Freight Claims Analyst
achievements: Resolved 98% of claims within the contractual time limits, maintaining high customer satisfaction.
Developed a reporting tool that streamlined data presentation for upper management.
Trained 5 new hires on the claims process, reducing onboarding time by 20%.

experience.title: Junior Claims Coordinator
achievements: Handled over 200 claims per month with an 85% success rate in favor of the company.
Improved documentation accuracy by 15% by implementing a new filing system.
Collaborated with the legal team on complex claims, contributing to a 10% reduction in litigations.

education.degree: B.S. in Logistics and Supply Chain Management

projects.name: Freight Claims Automation Project
projects.description: Led a project to automate the freight claims process, reducing manual entry errors and speeding up the claims resolution timeline.
